name: io.github.ai-mcpower/mcpower-proxy
title: MCPower Security Proxy
description: Security proxy that wraps MCP servers with real-time monitoring and policy enforcement
instructions:
## Easiest: Install VS Code/Cursor Extension

For automatic setup with IDE integration, install the MCPower extension:
https://www.mcpower.tech/

The extension automatically wraps all your MCP servers and provides real-time monitoring.

## Manual: Wrap Individual Servers

To manually wrap MCP servers, update your configuration:

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "secure-filesystem": {
      "command": "uvx",
      "args": [
        "mcpower-proxy",
        "--wrapped-config", "{\"command\": \"npx\", \"args\": [\"@modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem\", \"/path/to/dir\"]}",
        "--name", "SecureFS"
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

The proxy will:
- Intercept all MCP communication
- Redact secrets/PII locally before cloud analysis
- Enforce security policies
- Provide MCP monitoring
